ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Class AffineTransformation2

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.AffineTransformation2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AffineTransformable2, AxisStretchable2, LinearTransformable2, RigidBodyTransformable2, Rotatable2, Scalable, ShapePreservingTransformable2, Stretchable2, Translatable2, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvertibleAffineTransformation2

    public class AffineTransformation2
extends Object
implements AffineTransformable2, Serializable
    An abstract base class for classes implementing AffineTransformable2.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
